verses.name: John 14:13
verses.text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

verses.name: John 14:14
verses.text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name, I will do it.

verses.name: John 14:15
verses.text: If ye love me, keep my commandments.

verses.name: John 14:16
verses.text: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever;

verses.name: John 14:17
verses.text: Even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.
